mapper.select: SELECT p.preset_id, p.user_id, p.product_id, p.preset_name, u.nickname AS userNickname, img.img_url AS itemImageUrl FROM preset_tb p INNER JOIN user_tb u ON p.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN product_item_tb pi ON p.product_id = pi.product_id LEFT JOIN item_tb i ON pi.item_id = i.item_id LEFT JOIN image_tb img ON i.image_id = img.image_id WHERE p.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY p.preset_id DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM preset_tb WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND product_id = #{productId}
